paste.title: Paste your text
paste.content: Start by pasting or typing your text into the editor.

lock.title: Lock the document
lock.content: Press K or click the lock button to switch to annotation mode.

annotate.title: Annotate your text
annotate.content: Select text to highlight (H), comment (C), underline (U), or draw arrows (A).

unlock.title: Unlock to edit
unlock.content: Press K again to return to editing. Your annotations are preserved.
